O parte dintre ele sunt obligatorii, cum sunt cele necesare, care ajuta la buna functionare a site-ului. In sectiunea dedicata din acest mesaj, poti selecta cookie-urile pe care le accepti.<\/p>\n    <p>Nu uita ca pe eMAG un cookie te ajuta:<\/p>\n    <ul>\n        <li>sa primesti recomandarile si ofertele potrivite<\/li>\n        <li>sa afli cand scade pretul la produsele tale Favorite<\/li>\n        <li>sa ai o buna experienta de navigare si cumparare online.<\/li>\n    <\/ul>\n    <p>Dezactivarea anumitor cookie-uri poate afecta utilizarea site-ului si a serviciilor noastre.<\/p>";

    var translation_config = {

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/font_ro-beaeaf7.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/general-07fb65a.css">

            <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/login-07d5b93.css">
    
            <script type="text/javascript" src="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/js/assetic/login-10ab58d.js"></script>
    

<script type="text/javascript">
    var site_url = "https://www.emag.ro/";
    var currency_code = "RON";
    var cookie_domain = "emag.ro";
    var cookie_domain_extended = ".emag.ro";
    var _sf_perf = (new Date()).getTime();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME = 'clear_local_storage';

    function clearLocalStorageExcept(exceptionsArray){
        if (!Array.isArray(exceptionsArray)){
            exceptionsArray = [];
        }
        var storageKeys = Object.keys(localStorage);
        storageKeys.forEach(function(key) {
            if (exceptionsArray.indexOf(key) >= 0){
                return;
            }
            localStorage.removeItem(key);
        });
    }


    var clearCookieExceptions = [];
    if (window.PH && window.PH.cookie && parseInt(PH.cookie.get(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME))) {
        clearLocalStorageExcept(clearCookieExceptions);
        PH.cookie.set(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME,0,-1,'/',cookie_domain_extended);
    } else if (window.eCookie && parseInt(eCookie.get(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME))) {
        clearLocalStorageExcept(clearCookieExceptions);
        eCookie.set({ name:CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME, value:0, path: '/', domain: cookie_domain_extended || '' });
    } else if (parseInt($.cookie(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME))) {
        clearLocalStorageExcept(clearCookieExceptions);
        $.cookie(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME, 0, { path: '/', domain: cookie_domain_extended || '' })
    }

    var rcaFormTimestamp = window.localStorage.getItem("rcaFormTimestamp");
    var hrs72 = 72 * 3600 * 1000;
    if (rcaFormTimestamp && +rcaFormTimestamp + hrs72 < Date.now()) {
        // cleanup after 72 hours
        window.localStorage.removeItem("rcaFormTimestamp");
        window.localStorage.removeItem("rcaForm");
        window.localStorage.removeItem("rcaToken");
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var emagUuidCookie;
    if (window.PH && window.PH.cookie) {
        emagUuidCookie = PH.cookie.get('EMAGUUID');
        if (emagUuidCookie){
            localStorage.setItem('EMAGUUID', emagUuidCookie);
        }
    }else if (window.eCookie) {
        emagUuidCookie = eCookie.get('EMAGUUID');
        if (emagUuidCookie){
            localStorage.setItem('EMAGUUID', emagUuidCookie);
        }
    }else{
        emagUuidCookie = $.cookie('EMAGUUID');
        if (emagUuidCookie){
            localStorage.setItem('EMAGUUID', emagUuidCookie);
        }
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ajaxComplete(function() {
        if (window.PH && EM.dispatcher){
            PH.trigger(EM.dispatcher, "AjaxFinished");
        }
    });
</script>



<link rel="shortcut icon" href="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/favicon2.ico?v=2b">


<script type="text/javascript">
    var siteLocale = 'ro';
    var is_loggedin = typeof eUserInfo != 'undefined';
    var is_supermarket = document.location.pathname.indexOf("/supermarket") >= 0;

    function add_to_cart(queryString){
        varUrl = 'https://www.emag.ro/addtocart--' + queryString;
        $('#modify_cart').attr("action", varUrl);
        $('#modify_cart').submit();

        return true;
    }

    var search_url_prefix = '';
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="/js/general/emag_search_general.js?session_id=&amp;visitor_id=&amp;locale=ro&amp;page_type=login&amp;enable_search_suggestions=1"></script>

    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/export-megamenu-2010718.css">






<script>
    $.ajaxSetup({
        beforeSend: function (xhr){
            var LS_EMAGUUID = localStorage.getItem('EMAGUUID');
            if (!$.cookie('EMAGUUID') && LS_EMAGUUID){
                xhr.setRequestHeader("X-UUID",LS_EMAGUUID);
            }
        }
    });
</script><script src="https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js" async=""></script></head>

i=e.split("=");_.sendToDatalayer(t,i[0],i[0].replace(_.PREFIX,"")+i[1])}),e.delete(_.OTHER_ALLOCATION))}sendToAbLogger(t){let e={tests:{}};e.tests[this.name]=this.getVariantName(t),this.config.logger.log(e)}split(){const t=this.getName();if(this.config.cookie.has(t))return this.variants[this.config.cookie.get(t).replace(this.name,"").charCodeAt(0)-a.a.cookieA];const e=+this.config.randomizer.integer()%this.variants.length;return this.addToDataLayer(e),this.sendToAbLogger(e),this.variants[e]}run(){if(this.canRun()&&this.isAllowed()){const t=this.split();return this.config.curtain&&t.version!==String.fromCharCode(a.a.cookieA)&&c.a.addCurtain(),this.assignDetails(!0),t.getCallback()}return this.assignDetails(),()=>{}}assignDetails(t){this.reference.canRun=t||this.canRun(),this.reference.isAllowed=t||this.isAllowed(!0),this.reference.isExecuted=this.reference.canRun&&this.reference.isAllowed,this.reference.variant=this.config.cookie.get(this.getName()),this.rules.forEach((t,e)=>{this.reference.rules[e].isSatisfied=t.evaluate()})}}_.DEFAULT_TRAFFIC=100,_.DEFAULT_COOKIE=new n.a,_.DEFAULT_RANDOMIZER=new class{constructor(t){this.random=new o.a(t)}number(){return this.random.number()}integer(){return this.random.integer()}}(null),_.DEFAULT_LOGGER=new u,_.DEFAULT_DATALAYER=[],_.PREFIX="eab",_.OTHER_ALLOCATION="eab_allocation";class h{static applyConfig(t={}){return t.randomizer=t.randomizer||_.DEFAULT_RANDOMIZER,t.cookie=t.cookie||_.DEFAULT_COOKIE,t.logger=t.logger||_.DEFAULT_LOGGER,t.traffic=t.traffic||_.DEFAULT_TRAFFIC,t.dataLayer=t.dataLayer||window.dataLayer||_.DEFAULT_DATALAYER,t.slot=t.slot||0,t}static applyRules(t=[]){if(0===t.length)throw new Error("Incorrect rule definition");const e=[];for(const i of t)if(Array.isArray(i))e.push(h.applyRules(i));else{if(!r.isValid(i))throw new Error("Incorrect rule definition");e.push(new r(i))}return e}static applyVariants(t=[],e){if(0===t.length)throw new Error("No variants for experiment");const i=[],r=new n.a;for(let n=0;n<t.length;++n){if(!a.a.isValid(t[n]))throw new Error("Invalid variant definition");t[n].version=String.fromCharCode(a.a.cookieA+n),t[n].cookie=r,t[n].cookieName=e.getName(),i.push(new a.a(t[n]))}return i}}},function(t,e,i){var n=function(){"use strict";function t(t,e,i,n){this.setSeed(t,e,i,n)}t.prototype.setSeed=function(t,e,n,r){return null==e&&null==t?(e=4294967295*Math.random()>>>0,t=0):null==e&&(e=t,t=0),null==r&&null==n?(r=this.state_?this.state_[3]:4150755663,n=this.state_?this.state_[2]:335903614):null==r&&(r=n,n=0),this.state_=new Int32Array([0,0,n>>>0,(1|r)>>>0]),this.next_(),i(this.state_,this.state_[0],this.state_[1],t>>>0,e>>>0),this.next_(),this},t.prototype.getState=function(){return[this.state_[0],this.state_[1],this.state_[2],this.state_[3]]},t.prototype.setState=function(t){this.state_[0]=t[0],this.state_[1]=t[1],this.state_[2]=t[2],this.state_[3]=1|t[3]};var e=Math.imul;function i(t,e,i,n,r){var a=e+n>>>0,s=i+r>>>0;s>>>0<i>>>0&&(a=a+1|0),t[0]=a,t[1]=s}e||(e=function(t,e){var i=65535&t,n=65535&e;return i*n+((t>>>16&65535)*n+i*(e>>>16&65535)<<16>>>0)|0});t.prototype.next_=function(){var t,n,r,a,s,o,c,l,u=this.state_[0]>>>0,_=this.state_[1]>>>0;t=this.state_,n=u,l=((r=_)>>>16)*((a=1284865837)>>>16)+(((o=(65535&r)*(a>>>16)>>>0)>>>16)+((s=(r>>>16)*(65535&a)>>>0)>>>16))>>>0,(c=(c=(65535&r)*(65535&a)>>>0)+(o=o<<16>>>0)>>>0)>>>0<o>>>0&&(l=l+1>>>0),(c=c+(s=s<<16>>>0)>>>0)>>>0<s>>>0&&(l=l+1>>>0),l=(l=l+e(r,1481765933)>>>0)+e(n,a)>>>0,t[0]=l,t[1]=c,i(this.state_,this.state_[0],this.state_[1],this.state_[2],this.state_[3]);var strict";__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);var _runner__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__=__webpack_require__(1),_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__=__webpack_require__(3);((window,EM,Experiments)=>{function sanitizedRules(rules){if(null==rules)return[];const sanitized=[];for(let rule of rules)if(Array.isArray(rule))sanitized.push(sanitizedRules(rule));else{let actual;try{actual=eval(rule.actual),actual=null!==actual?actual:"null"}catch(t){actual="null"}sanitized.push({type:rule.type,expected:rule.expected,actual:actual})}return sanitized}try{if(window.Cookie=_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a.DEFAULT_COOKIE,_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a.logOtherAllocations(window.dataLayer),0!==Experiments.data.length){let t=[],e=new Date;for(let i=0;i<Experiments.data.length;++i){let n=Experiments.data[i];if(!(e<new Date(n.dateStart)||e>new Date(n.dateEnd)))try{t.push(new _experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a(`${_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a.PREFIX}${n.id}`,{curtain:n.curtain,exclusive:n.exclusive,traffic:n.traffic,dataLayer:window.dataLayer},sanitizedRules(n.rules),n.variations.map(t=>({name:"",callback:t.callback})),n.exclusions,n))}catch(t){}}new _runner__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.a(t)}}catch(t){_runner__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.a.removeCurtain()}})(window,window.EM||{},window.EXPERIMENTS||{data:[]})}]);</script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://s12emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/js/assetic/gui-ccf6cbf.js"></script>

<div class="clear_4g5fea56" style="position:fixed;left:100%"></div><script type="text/javascript">
(function($) {
    var $form = $('.form-auth'),
        $email = $('#email'),
        $password = $form.find('#password'),
        initial_email = '',
        step2 = false,
        $emailExternal = $('#email_external'),
        emptyExternalLogin = false;

    var onSubmit = function(event) {
        if(emptyExternalLogin) {
            $email.val($emailExternal.val());
        } else {
            $emailExternal.val($email.val());
        }

        if (!$form.guiValidate()) {
            return false;
        }

        if (!step2) {
            event.preventDefault();
                        $email.attr('name', 'email_address');
            resetPasswordField();
            var $btn = $form.find('.auth-submit');
            $btn.prop('disabled', true);
            var formData = {
                email_address: $form.find('#email').val()
            };
                        // ajax call to get user additional info or redirect to register
            var promise = $.ajax({
                url: '/user/check_email',
                type: 'post',
                data: formData

            });

            promise.done(function (data) {
                step2 = true;
                                if (data.registered) {
                    // hide the email field
                    if(typeof data.no_keep == 'undefined' || !data.no_keep ){
                        $form.find('.user-info').removeClass('no-keep');
                    }else if(data.no_keep){
                        $form.find('.user-info').addClass('no-keep');
                    }
                    $form.find('.user-image').attr('src', data.image);
                    $form.find('.user-name').html(data.name);
                    $form.find('.user-email').html(data.email);

                    $form.find('#step2_email').attr('value', data.email);
                    $form.find('#step2_email').val(data.email);

                    if (data.password_expired) {
                        $form.find('.user-info .big-margin').removeClass('big-margin');

                        $form.find('.step1').hide();
                        $form.find('.step2').hide();
                        $form.find('.user-back').remove();
                        $form.find('.stepUserInfo').show();
                        $form.find('.stepPasswordExpired').show();
                        $form.find('.stepEmptyExternalLogin').hide();

                        $form.attr('action', '/user/forgotpassword');
                        $password.attr('data-validate', '');
                    } else {
                        $password.attr('data-validate', 'required');
                        $form.find('.step1').hide();
                        $form.find('.stepEmptyExternalLogin').hide();
                        $form.find('.step2').show();
                    }

                    if($.cookie('site_version_11') !== 'not_mobile') {
                        window.scrollTo(0, 0);
                    }

                                        if ($.cookie('site_version_11') === 'not_mobile'
                        && (initial_email !== $email.val() || $password.val() == '')
                    ) {
                        $password.focus();
                    }

                    $btn.prop('disabled', false);

                } else {                     $btn.prop('disabled', true);
                    $form.attr('action', data.redirect);
                    $password.attr('data-validate', '');
                    $form.submit();
                }
            });

            promise.fail(function (data) {
                $btn.prop('disabled', false);
                console.error(data);
            });
        } else {
                        $email.attr('name', 'email_address');
                        $form.append('<input name="username" style="display:none" value="'+$email.val()+'">');
            var $btn = $form.find('.auth-submit');
            $btn.prop('disabled', true);
        }
    }

    var changeFormAction = function(event) {
        event.preventDefault();
        $form.attr('action', '/user/forgotpassword');
        $password.attr('data-validate', '');
        if($(this).hasClass('auth-guest-submit')){
            $('<input>').attr({ type : 'hidden' , 'name' : 'continue_as_guest'}).appendTo($form);
        }
        $form.submit();
    }

    var backToEmail = function (event){
        step2 = false;
        emptyExternalLogin = false;
        $form.find('.step1').show();
        $form.find('.stepEmptyExternalLogin').hide();
        $form.find('.step2').hide();
        $form.find('.step2').disableValidation();
        $form.find('.auth-submit').prop('disabled', false);
        $form.guiValidate();
        $form.find('.custom_error_message').remove();
        $email.focus();                return false;
    }
    var resetPasswordField = function () {
        if (initial_email !== $email.val()) {
            $password.focus().val('');
                    }
    }
    // event listeners
    $form.on('submit', onSubmit);

        if($.cookie('site_version_11') !== 'not_mobile') {
        $email.on('click', function() {
            if ($('.auth-title').offset().top > $(window).scrollTop()) {
                $('html, body').animate({scrollTop: $('.auth-title').offset().top}, 'slow');
            }
        });
    }

        $email.on('focusout', function(){
        resetPasswordField();
    });
        $form.on('click', '.auth-forgot-password, .auth-guest-submit', changeFormAction);
    $form.on('click','.user-back',backToEmail);

    $(document).ready(function () {
                            $email.focus();
        
                $email.on('input', function () {
            if (initial_email == '') {
                initial_email = $email.val();
            }
        }).change();
    });

})($111);
if ($('#keep_email').length) {
        $('label[for=keep_email] span').bubbletip(
        $('#keep_email_show'), {
            deltaDirection: 'down',
            animationDuration: 100,
            offsetRight: 0,
            offsetLeft: 32,
            calculateOnShow: true,
            delayShow:100,
            delayHide:100
        }
    );
}
</script><table class="bubbletip" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="opacity: 0; width: 721px; height: 81px; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: -328.5px; display: none;"><tbody><tr><td class="bt-topleft"></td><td><table class="bt-top" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><th></th><td><div></div></td><th></th></tr></tbody></table></td><td class="bt-topright"></td></tr><tr><td class="bt-left"></td><td class="bt-content"><div id="keep_email_show" hidden="" style="display: block;">
    <div>Pastrati aceasta optiune activa doar pentru dispozitive personale. Pentru dispozitive partajate, debifati optiunea. </div>
</div></td><td class="bt-right"></td></tr><tr><td class="bt-bottomleft"></td><td class="bt-bottom"></td><td class="bt-bottomright"></td></tr></tbody></table>

<script type="text/javascript" id="">!function(b,e,f,g,a,c,d){b.fbq||(a=b.fbq=function(){a.callMethod?a.callMethod.apply(a,arguments):a.queue.push(arguments)},b._fbq||(b._fbq=a),a.push=a,a.loaded=!0,a.version="2.0",a.queue=[],c=e.createElement(f),c.async=!0,c.src=g,d=e.getElementsByTagName(f)[0],d.parentNode.insertBefore(c,d))}(window,document,"script","https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js");fbq("init","892293880821529",{em:google_tag_manager["GTM-TKS335"].macro(185),ph:google_tag_manager["GTM-TKS335"].macro(186)});fbq("track","PageView");
